name: D::Light
description: A lighting software for Windows, Mac OS and Linux.
available on the D::Light website. They are stored in a binary format
(.dld), but D::Light also supports non-encrypted fixtures in
an XML format. Thus, creating an import plugin is not possible.
fixtureUsage: Import fixture in Device Listing window (Devices > Device Listing),
